name: Last Mag: Make it count
description:
Last Mag: Make it count

Created for the GMTK 2019 Game jam. The theme for this jam was "Only One". As such, we created a top-down shooter where there is only one magazine and everyone has to share.

Timer stops once every enemy is defeated. Post your time in the comments, I'd love to know!

ActionInputMovement
WASD or Arrows
ShootLeft Click
Rack (cycle next round)
Right Click
Insert a Blank
QRestartR

If you're looking for the repo it's over here

Made with Godot Engine.
